Description: Experiment identifier used to link experiments across subsets, groups and subgroups

General description of experiment. Can include noteworthy events, findings, etc.

Experimental factor combinations
Number of blocks or replicates
Number of treatments
General notes on execution of experiment.
General type of experiment, e.g., varietal trial
Experimental design

Type of site, e.g., station, on-farm
Whether managed by researchers, producers
Year associated with experiment or crop rotation
Duration of experiment in years
Duration of experiment in seasons
Indication of whether location should be anonymized (N= anonymize names, L = anonymize locations, NL or LN  = anonymize both names and location)
Crop rotation indicator (=1 for continuous, multi-year simulation, =0 for single year simulations with multiple initializations)
Cropping system descriptive name
Data license name and url
Distribution limitations for the data set
Funding source(s) for this data set
File version for ICASA standard
Date the file was first created
Date the file was last revised
Notes describing reasons for the revision
Any additional information describing or clarifying the metadata.
Unique identifier to identify a person associated with a dataset

Unique identifier to identify an document associated with a dataset
